review: I don't yet know whether or not I actually like it because it has a major design flaw in that the power cord isn't long enough to reach a "nearby receptacle". Since I don't do things by half measure (ie extension cord), I'll have to have a receptacle installed. The length of cord is fine if there is a receptacle at standard height (15" off of the floor) and directly to the right of the TV. Thank goodness I'm married to an electrician but others won't be so lucky and are looking at $150, easily, to have a receptacle installed. Serious design flaw!
author: Bobbi Whitlock

review: Might just be the greatest thing ever invented.  If I can figure it out...anybody can.  Connected right away to home WiFi and I downloaded the Fire TV stick app to my phone and was using voice commands to search what I wanted to watch.  I think they made it very user friendly and highly recommend this as an alternative to additional cable TV add-on channels that are usually costly.  Very pleased with Amazon Prime overall, but this was the icing on the cake.
